pli-tv-kd11:1.1.2_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd11:1.1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā,
pli-tv-kd11:1.1.3_1: yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.1.6_0: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.1.9_0: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattanti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.1_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.2_0: “kathañhi nāma paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū attanā bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā,
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.2_1: yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vakkhanti—
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.5_0: Tumhe tena paṇḍitatarā ca byattatarā ca bahussutatarā ca alamattatarā ca.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.8_0: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṁvattantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:1.2.9_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.

pli-tv-kd11:1.2.11_2: yepi caññe bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā te upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—

pli-tv-kd11:4.2.5_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:4.2.6_0: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, tajjanīyakammaṁ kareyya.

pli-tv-kd11:5.1.8_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena tajjanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:6.1.1_0: Atha kho saṅgho paṇḍukalohitakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tajjanīyakammaṁ akāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:6.1.2_0: Te saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṁ pātenti, netthāraṁ vattanti,
pli-tv-kd11:6.1.3_1: saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattāma, lomaṁ pātema, netthāraṁ vattāma,
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.5_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena tajjanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.9_0: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.2_0: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti,
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.5_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena tajjanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.6_0: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:7.1.9_0: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—

pli-tv-kd11:8.2.2_0: Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṁ pātenti, netthāraṁ vattanti,
pli-tv-kd11:8.2.6_0: Ime paṇḍukalohitakā bhikkhū saṅghena tajjanīyakammakatā sammā vattanti, lomaṁ pātenti, netthāraṁ vattanti,

pli-tv-kd11:9.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā seyyasako bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.3_0: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṁ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṁ dentā abbhentā.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.4_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.5_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā seyyasako bālo bhavissati abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.7_0: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṁ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṁ dentā abbhentā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.8_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.9_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.10_1: seyyasako bhikkhu bālo abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.12_0: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṁ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṁ dentā abbhentā”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.15_1: tassa moghapurisassa ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.16_1: moghapuriso bālo bhavissati abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.1.18_0: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṁ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṁ dentā abbhentā.
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.2_0: Paṭhamaṁ seyyasako bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbo,
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.2_1: āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.4_0: Ayaṁ seyyasako bhikkhu bālo abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.6_0: apissu bhikkhū pakatā parivāsaṁ dentā mūlāya paṭikassantā mānattaṁ dentā abbhentā.

pli-tv-kd11:13.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena assajipunabbasukā nāma kīṭāgirismiṁ āvāsikā honti alajjino pāpabhikkhū.
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.3_0: mālāvacchaṁ ropentipi ropāpentipi, siñcantipi siñcāpentipi, ocinantipi ocināpentipi, ganthentipi ganthāpentipi,
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.4_0: Te kulitthīnaṁ kuladhītānaṁ kulakumārīnaṁ kulasuṇhānaṁ kuladāsīnaṁ ekatovaṇṭikamālaṁ harantipi harāpentipi,
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.5_0: Te kulitthīhi kuladhītāhi kulakumārīhi kulasuṇhāhi kuladāsīhi saddhiṁ ekabhājanepi bhuñjanti, ekathālakepi pivanti, ekāsanepi nisīdanti, ekamañcepi tuvaṭṭenti, ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti,
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.5_1: ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭenti, vikālepi bhuñjanti, majjampi pivanti,
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.5_2: mālāgandhavilepanampi dhārenti, naccantipi, gāyantipi, vādentipi, lāsentipi;

pli-tv-kd11:13.1.7_0: gāyantiyāpi naccanti, gāyantiyāpi gāyanti, gāyantiyāpi vādenti, gāyantiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.8_0: vādentiyāpi naccanti, vādentiyāpi gāyanti, vādentiyāpi vādenti, vādentiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.1.9_0: lāsentiyāpi naccanti, lāsentiyāpi gāyanti, lāsentiyāpi vādenti, lāsentiyāpi lāsenti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.2.1_0: aṭṭhapadepi kīḷanti, dasapadepi kīḷanti, ākāsepi kīḷanti, parihārapathepi kīḷanti, santikāyapi kīḷanti, khalikāyapi kīḷanti, ghaṭikāyapi kīḷanti, salākahatthenapi kīḷanti, akkhenapi kīḷanti, paṅgacīrenapi kīḷanti, vaṅkakenapi kīḷanti, mokkhacikāyapi kīḷanti, ciṅgulakenapi kīḷanti, pattāḷhakenapi kīḷanti, rathakenapi kīḷanti, dhanukenapi kīḷanti, akkharikāyapi kīḷanti, manesikāyapi kīḷanti, yathāvajjenapi kīḷanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.2.2_0: hatthismimpi sikkhanti, assasmimpi sikkhanti, rathasmimpi sikkhanti, dhanusmimpi sikkhanti, tharusmimpi sikkhanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.2.3_0: hatthissapi purato dhāvanti, assassapi purato dhāvanti,
pli-tv-kd11:13.2.5_0: raṅgamajjhepi saṅghāṭiṁ pattharitvā naccakiṁ evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu kāsīsu vassaṁvuṭṭho sāvatthiṁ gacchanto bhagavantaṁ dassanāya yena kīṭāgiri tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.2_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kīṭāgiriṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena,
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.4_0: “kvāyaṁ abalabalo viya mandamando viya bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko viya?
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.6_0: Amhākaṁ pana ayyā assajipunabbasukā saṇhā sakhilā sukhasambhāsā mihitapubbaṅgamā ehisvāgatavādino abbhākuṭikā uttānamukhā pubbabhāsino.
pli-tv-kd11:13.3.8_0: Addasā kho aññataro upāsako taṁ bhikkhuṁ kīṭāgirismiṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.1_0: Atha kho so upāsako taṁ bhikkhuṁ gharaṁ netvā bhojetvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:13.4.4_1: mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vanda, evañca vadehi—

pli-tv-kd11:13.5.1_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho so bhikkhu tassa upāsakassa paṭissuṇitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena sāvatthi tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.2_0: Anupubbena yena sāvatthi jetavanaṁ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.3_0: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodituṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.9_0: appakilamathena ca ahaṁ, bhante, addhānaṁ āgato.
pli-tv-kd11:13.5.10_1: kāsīsu vassaṁvuṭṭho sāvatthiṁ āgacchanto bhagavantaṁ dassanāya yena kīṭāgiri tadavasariṁ.

pli-tv-kd11:13.6.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.2_1: assajipunabbasukā nāma kīṭāgirismiṁ āvāsikā alajjino pāpabhikkhū?
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.6_0: Yepi te manussā pubbe saddhā ahesuṁ pasannā tepi etarahi assaddhā appasannā?
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.7_0: Yānipi tāni saṅghassa pubbe dānapathāni tānipi etarahi upacchinnāni?
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.14_0: Te kulitthīnaṁ kuladhītānaṁ kulakumārīnaṁ kulasuṇhānaṁ kuladāsīnaṁ ekatovaṇṭikamālaṁ harissantipi harāpessantipi,
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.15_0: Te kulitthīhi kuladhītāhi kulakumārīhi kulasuṇhāhi kuladāsīhi saddhiṁ ekabhājanepi bhuñjissanti, ekathālakepi pivissanti, ekāsanepi nisīdissanti, ekamañcepi tuvaṭṭissanti, ekattharaṇāpi tuvaṭṭissanti, ekapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭissanti,
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.15_1: ekattharaṇapāvuraṇāpi tuvaṭṭissanti, vikālepi bhuñjissanti, majjampi pivissanti,
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.15_2: mālāgandhavilepanampi dhāressanti, naccissantipi, gāyissantipi, vādessantipi, lāsessantipi;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.16_0: naccantiyāpi naccissanti, naccantiyāpi gāyissanti, naccantiyāpi vādessanti, naccantiyāpi lāsessanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.17_0: gāyantiyāpi naccissanti, gāyantiyāpi gāyissanti, gāyantiyāpi vādessanti, gāyantiyāpi lāsessanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.18_0: vādentiyāpi naccissanti, vādentiyāpi gāyissanti, vādentiyāpi vādessanti, vādentiyāpi lāsessanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.19_0: lāsentiyāpi naccissanti, lāsentiyāpi gāyissanti, lāsentiyāpi vādessanti, lāsentiyāpi lāsessanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.20_0: aṭṭhapadepi kīḷissanti, dasapadepi kīḷissanti, ākāsepi kīḷissanti, parihārapathepi kīḷissanti, santikāyapi kīḷissanti, khalikāyapi kīḷissanti, ghaṭikāyapi kīḷissanti, salākahatthenapi kīḷissanti, akkhenapi kīḷissanti, paṅgacīrenapi kīḷissanti,
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.20_1: vaṅkakenapi kīḷissanti mokkhacikāyapi kīḷissanti, ciṅgulakenapi kīḷissanti, pattāḷhakenapi kīḷissanti, rathakenapi kīḷissanti, dhanukenapi kīḷissanti, akkharikāyapi kīḷissanti, manesikāyapi kīḷissanti, yathāvajjenapi kīḷissanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.21_0: hatthismimpi sikkhissanti, assasmimpi sikkhissanti, rathasmimpi sikkhissanti, dhanusmimpi sikkhissanti, tharusmimpi sikkhissanti;
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.24_0: raṅgamajjhepi saṅghāṭiṁ pattharitvā naccakiṁ evaṁ vakkhanti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.31_1: kīṭāgiriṁ gantvā assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ karotha,
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.32_1: assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ karoma, caṇḍā te bhikkhū pharusā”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.2_0: paṭhamaṁ assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū codetabbā, codetvā sāretabbā, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.2_1: āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.5_0: Imesaṁ pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.6_0: Kulāni ca imehi duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.7_1: saṅgho assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.12_0: Imesaṁ pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.13_0: Kulāni ca imehi duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.14_0: Saṅgho assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.16_0: Yassāyasmato khamati assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhūhi kīṭāgirismiṁ vatthabbanti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.22_0: Imesaṁ pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.23_0: Kulāni ca imehi duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca.
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.24_0: Saṅgho assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.26_0: Yassāyasmato khamati assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhūhi kīṭāgirismiṁ vatthabbanti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:13.7.28_0: Kataṁ saṅghena assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ—

pli-tv-kd11:14.2.1_0: Tiṇṇaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.2_0: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.3_0: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.5_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:14.2.6_0: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, pabbājanīyakammaṁ kareyya.

pli-tv-kd11:15.1.8_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena pabbājanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.1_0: Atha kho sāriputtamoggallānappamukho bhikkhusaṅgho kīṭāgiriṁ gantvā assajipunabbasukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.3_0: Te saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā na sammā vattanti, na lomaṁ pātenti, na netthāraṁ vattanti;
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.7_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.8_0: “kathañhi nāma assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā na sammā vattissanti, na lomaṁ pātessanti, na netthāraṁ vattissanti;
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.12_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.13_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.14_1: assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā na sammā vattanti, na lomaṁ pātenti, na netthāraṁ vattanti;
pli-tv-kd11:16.1.21_1: moghapurisā saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā na sammā vattissanti, na lomaṁ pātessanti, na netthāraṁ vattissanti;
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.5_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena pabbājanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.9_0: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.13_0: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti,
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.16_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena pabbājanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.17_0: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:16.2.20_0: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:17.1.2_1: pabbājanīyakammakatena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:17.1.3_1: saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi,
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.2_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.6_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.8_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.13_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.15_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno pabbājanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:17.2.18_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sudhammo macchikāsaṇḍe cittassa gahapatino āvāsiko hoti, navakammiko dhuvabhattiko.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.2_0: Yadā citto gahapati saṅghaṁ vā gaṇaṁ vā puggalaṁ vā nimantetukāmo hoti tadā na āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ anapaloketvā saṅghaṁ vā gaṇaṁ vā puggalaṁ vā nimanteti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā therā bhikkhū, āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno, āyasmā ca mahākaccāno, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko, āyasmā ca mahākappino, āyasmā ca mahācundo, āyasmā ca anuruddho, āyasmā ca revato, āyasmā ca upāli, āyasmā ca ānando, āyasmā ca rāhulo,
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.3_1: kāsīsu cārikaṁ caramānā yena macchikāsaṇḍo tadavasaruṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.4_0: Assosi kho citto gahapati therā kira bhikkhū macchikāsaṇḍaṁ anuppattāti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.5_0: Atha kho citto gahapati yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.5_1: upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.6_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho cittaṁ gahapatiṁ āyasmā sāriputto dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.7_0: Atha kho citto gahapati āyasmatā sāriputtena dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito there bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.1_0: Atha kho citto gahapati therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ adhivāsanaṁ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yenāyasmā sudhammo tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.2_0: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.3_1: ayyo sudhammo svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ therehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.5_0: “pubbe khvāyaṁ citto gahapati yadā saṅghaṁ vā gaṇaṁ vā puggalaṁ vā nimantetukāmo na maṁ anapaloketvā saṅghaṁ vā gaṇaṁ vā puggalaṁ vā nimanteti;
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.6_0: sodāni maṁ anapaloketvā there bhikkhū nimantesi;
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.7_0: duṭṭhodānāyaṁ citto gahapati anapekkho virattarūpo mayī”ti cittaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.10_0: tatiyampi kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.11_1: ayyo sudhammo svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ therehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.2.14_0: “kiṁ me karissati ayyo sudhammo adhivāsento vā anadhivāsento vā”ti āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.1_0: Atha kho citto gahapati tassā rattiyā accayena therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpesi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.3_0: “yannūnāhaṁ cittassa gahapatino therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭiyattaṁ passeyyan”ti pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena cittassa gahapatino nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.4_0: Atha kho citto gahapati yenāyasmā sudhammo tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.4_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ sudhammaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.5_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho cittaṁ gahapatiṁ āyasmā sudhammo etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.7_0: ekā ca kho idha natthi yadidaṁ tilasaṅguḷikā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.8_1: ratane buddhavacane vijjamāne ayyena sudhammena yadeva kiñci bhāsitaṁ yadidaṁ tilasaṅguḷikāti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.9_1: dakkhiṇāpathakā vāṇijā puratthimaṁ janapadaṁ agamaṁsu vāṇijjāya.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.13_1: kukkuṭapotako kākavassaṁ vassitukāmo hoti, kākakukkuṭīti vassati;
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.14_0: yadā kukkuṭivassaṁ vassitukāmo hoti, kukkuṭikākāti vassati.
pli-tv-kd11:18.3.15_1: bahumhi ratane buddhavacane vijjamāne ayyena sudhammena yadeva kiñci bhāsitaṁ yadidaṁ tilasaṅguḷikā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.1_0: “Akkosasi maṁ tvaṁ, gahapati, paribhāsasi maṁ tvaṁ, gahapati.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.8_0: tatiyampi kho āyasmā sudhammo cittaṁ gahapatiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.9_0: “akkosasi maṁ tvaṁ, gahapati, paribhāsasi maṁ tvaṁ, gahapati.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.13_1: yañca mayā bhaṇitaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocehi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.4.14_1: yaṁ ayyo sudhammo punadeva macchikāsaṇḍaṁ paccāgaccheyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sudhammo senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.2_0: Anupubbena yena sāvatthi jetavanaṁ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sudhammo yañca attanā bhaṇitaṁ yañca cittena gahapatinā bhaṇitaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd11:18.5.6_1: cittaṁ gahapatiṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ dāyakaṁ kārakaṁ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṁ hīnena khuṁsessasi, hīnena vambhessasi?
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.2_0: paṭhamaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbo,
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.2_1: āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.4_0: Ayaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu cittaṁ gahapatiṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ dāyakaṁ kārakaṁ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṁ hīnena khuṁseti, hīnena vambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.9_0: Ayaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu cittaṁ gahapatiṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ dāyakaṁ kārakaṁ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṁ hīnena khuṁseti, hīnena vambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.12_0: Yassāyasmato khamati sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—citto te gahapati khamāpetabboti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.17_0: Ayaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu cittaṁ gahapatiṁ saddhaṁ pasannaṁ dāyakaṁ kārakaṁ saṅghupaṭṭhākaṁ hīnena khuṁseti, hīnena vambheti.
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.20_0: Yassāyasmato khamati sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa karaṇaṁ—citto te gahapati khamāpetabboti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:18.6.24_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.1_1: aṅgehi samannāgataṁ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.2_0: Asammukhā kataṁ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.3_1: tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.4_1: tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ adhammakammañca hoti, avinayakammañca, duvūpasantañca.
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.6_0: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, asāretvā kataṁ hoti,
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.7_0: asammukhā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.8_0: appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.9_0: appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.10_0: anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:19.1.11_0: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…

pli-tv-kd11:20.1.1_1: aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.2_2: gihīnaṁ anāvāsāya parisakkati, gihī akkosati paribhāsati, gihī gihīhi bhedeti—
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.3_1: pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.4_1: pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.6_1: pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.7_0: Pañcannaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.8_3: eko gihī akkosati paribhāsati, eko gihī gihīhi bhedeti—
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.9_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.10_0: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.11_3: eko gihī hīnena khuṁseti hīnena vambheti,
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.11_4: eko gihīnaṁ dhammikaṁ paṭissavaṁ na saccāpeti—
pli-tv-kd11:20.1.12_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:21.1.8_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:22.1.1_0: Atha kho saṅgho sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:22.1.3_0: So saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato macchikāsaṇḍaṁ gantvā maṅkubhūto nāsakkhi cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:22.1.7_1: macchikāsaṇḍaṁ gantvā maṅkubhūto nāsakkhiṁ cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.4_1: yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.6_1: saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūtaṁ dadeyya cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.9_0: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūtaṁ deti cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.10_0: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūtassa dānaṁ cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetuṁ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.12_0: Dinno saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu sudhammassa bhikkhuno anudūto cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpetuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:22.2.13_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.1_1: sudhammena bhikkhunā anudūtena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ macchikāsaṇḍaṁ gantvā citto gahapati khamāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.4_0: No ce khamati, anudūtena bhikkhunā vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.7_0: No ce khamati, anudūtena bhikkhunā vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.8_0: ‘khama, gahapati, imassa bhikkhuno, ahaṁ taṁ pasādemī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.10_0: No ce khamati, anudūtena bhikkhunā vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.13_1: anudūtena bhikkhunā sudhammo bhikkhu cittassa gahapatino dassanūpacāraṁ avijahāpetvā savanūpacāraṁ avijahāpetvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ kārāpetvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṁ paggaṇhāpetvā taṁ āpattiṁ desāpetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:23.1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sudhammo anudūtena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ macchikāsaṇḍaṁ gantvā cittaṁ gahapatiṁ khamāpesi.
pli-tv-kd11:23.1.2_0: So sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:23.1.3_1: saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.5_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.9_0: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.13_0: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti,
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.16_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.17_0: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:23.2.20_0: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.2_1: sudhammena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.3_1: saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi,
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.8_0: Ayaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.12_0: Ayaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.14_0: Yassāyasmato khamati sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.19_0: Ayaṁ sudhammo bhikkhu saṅghena paṭisāraṇīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.21_0: Yassāyasmato khamati sudhammassa bhikkhuno paṭisāraṇīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhi, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd11:24.1.24_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ passituṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.3_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchissati āpattiṁ passitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.5_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.7_1: channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ passitun”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.11_1: moghapuriso āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchissati āpattiṁ passituṁ?
pli-tv-kd11:25.1.15_0: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karotu—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.2_0: paṭhamaṁ channo bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbo,
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.2_1: āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.4_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ passituṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.5_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.9_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ passituṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.10_0: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.12_0: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane,
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.18_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ passituṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.19_0: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.21_0: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane,
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.24_0: Kataṁ saṅghena channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.26_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.

pli-tv-kd11:26.1.2_0: Asammukhā kataṁ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—

pli-tv-kd11:26.1.36_0: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.39_1: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.40_1: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.41_0: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti,
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.42_1: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.43_1: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.44_0: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.45_1: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.46_0: Tiṇṇaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.47_0: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.48_0: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.50_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.51_0: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.53_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.54_0: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:26.1.56_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.1_0: Āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.8_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.33_0: Na pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabbaṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.35_0: na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabbaṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.37_0: na pakatatto bhikkhu āsādetabbo anto vā bahi vā.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.1_0: Atha kho saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.3_1: ukkhepanīyakammakato tamhā āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.4_0: Tattha bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṁ, na paccuṭṭhesuṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.4_1: na añjalikammaṁ na sāmīcikammaṁ akaṁsu, na sakkariṁsu, na garuṁ kariṁsu, na mānesuṁ, na pūjesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.5_0: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.6_0: Tatthapi bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṁ, na paccuṭṭhesuṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.6_1: na añjalikammaṁ na sāmīcikammaṁ akaṁsu, na sakkariṁsu, na garuṁ kariṁsu, na mānesuṁ, na pūjesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.7_0: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.8_0: Tatthapi bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṁ, na paccuṭṭhesuṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.8_1: na añjalikammaṁ na sāmīcikammaṁ akaṁsu, na sakkariṁsu, na garuṁ kariṁsu, na mānesuṁ, na pūjesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.9_0: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato punadeva kosambiṁ paccāgañchi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.10_0: So sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.11_1: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.14_0: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane,
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.5_1: ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.9_0: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṁ, paccuṭṭhānaṁ, añjalikammaṁ, sāmīcikammaṁ, āsanābhihāraṁ sādiyati—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.12_0: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno seyyābhihāraṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ, pādakathalikaṁ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.15_0: Pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, ācāravipattiyā anuddhaṁseti,
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.15_1: diṭṭhivipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, ājīvavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, bhikkhuṁ bhikkhūhi bhedeti—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.18_0: Gihiddhajaṁ dhāreti, titthiyaddhajaṁ dhāreti, titthiye sevati;
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.19_0: bhikkhū na sevati, bhikkhusikkhāya na sikkhati—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.22_0: Pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekacchanne āvāse vasati, ekacchanne anāvāse vasati,
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.22_1: ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vasati;
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.23_0: pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ disvā āsanā na vuṭṭhāti;
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.24_0: pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ āsādeti anto vā bahi vā—
pli-tv-kd11:28.2.27_0: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.2_0: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti,
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.5_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.6_0: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.9_0: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṁ, paccuṭṭhānaṁ, añjalikammaṁ, sāmīcikammaṁ, āsanābhihāraṁ sādiyati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.12_0: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno seyyābhihāraṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ, pādakathalikaṁ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.18_0: Na gihiddhajaṁ dhāreti, na titthiyaddhajaṁ dhāreti, na titthiye sevati, bhikkhū sevati, bhikkhusikkhāya sikkhati—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.21_0: Na pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekacchanne āvāse vasati,
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.21_2: na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vasati,
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.21_4: na pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ āsādeti anto vā bahi vā—
pli-tv-kd11:29.1.24_0: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.2_1: channena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.3_1: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi,
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.3_2: āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.8_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghena, āpattiyā adassane,
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.8_1: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.8_2: āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.9_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane,
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.12_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghena, āpattiyā adassane,
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.12_1: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā adassane,
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.14_0: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane,
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.19_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghena, āpattiyā adassane,
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.19_1: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā adassane,
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.21_0: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane,
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.23_0: Paṭippassaddhaṁ saṅghena channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:30.1.24_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ paṭikātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.3_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchissati āpattiṁ paṭikātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.5_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.7_1: channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ paṭikātun”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.11_1: moghapuriso āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchissati āpattiṁ paṭikātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.15_0: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karotu—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.18_0: paṭhamaṁ channo bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbo,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.18_1: āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.20_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ paṭikātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.21_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.25_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ paṭikātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.26_0: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.28_0: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.34_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu āpattiṁ āpajjitvā na icchati āpattiṁ paṭikātuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.35_0: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.37_0: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.40_0: Kataṁ saṅghena channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.42_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.46.1_0: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.47_0: Asammukhā kataṁ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.48_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.49_0: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.51_0: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, asāretvā kataṁ hoti,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.52_0: asammukhā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.53_0: appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.54_0: appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.55_0: anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.56_0: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.57_0: desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.58_0: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.59_0: asāretvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.60_0: āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.61_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.63.1_0: Tīhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.64_0: Sammukhā kataṁ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.65_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.66_0: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.68_0: codetvā kataṁ hoti, sāretvā kataṁ hoti,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.69_0: sammukhā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.70_0: paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.71_0: paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.72_0: āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.73_0: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.74_0: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.75_0: codetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.76_0: sāretvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.77_0: āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.78_0: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhaṅgehi samannāgataṁ, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.80.1_1: aṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.81_0: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.84_1: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.85_1: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.86_0: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.87_1: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.88_1: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.89_0: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.90_1: tīhaṅgehi samannāgatassa bhikkhuno, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.91_0: Tiṇṇaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.92_0: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.93_0: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.95_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.96_0: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.98_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.99_0: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.101_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kareyya.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.103.1_0: Āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.110_1: ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.135_0: Na pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabbaṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.137_0: na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabbaṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.139_0: na pakatatto bhikkhu āsādetabbo anto vā bahi vā.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.149_0: Atha kho saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ akāsi—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.151_1: ukkhepanīyakammakato tamhā āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.152_0: Tattha bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṁ, na paccuṭṭhesuṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.152_1: na añjalikammaṁ na sāmīcikammaṁ akaṁsu, na sakkariṁsu, na garuṁ kariṁsu, na mānesuṁ, na pūjesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.153_0: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.154_0: Tatthapi bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṁ, na paccuṭṭhesuṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.154_1: na añjalikammaṁ na sāmīcikammaṁ akaṁsu, na sakkariṁsu, na garuṁ kariṁsu, na mānesuṁ, na pūjesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.155_0: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato tamhāpi āvāsā aññaṁ āvāsaṁ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.156_0: Tatthapi bhikkhū neva abhivādesuṁ, na paccuṭṭhesuṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.156_1: na añjalikammaṁ na sāmīcikammaṁ akaṁsu, na sakkariṁsu, na garuṁ kariṁsu, na mānesuṁ, na pūjesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.157_0: So bhikkhūhi asakkariyamāno agarukariyamāno amāniyamāno apūjiyamāno asakkārapakato punadeva kosambiṁ paccāgañchi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.158_0: So sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.159_1: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.162_0: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.167_1: ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.169_0: pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṁ, paccuṭṭhānaṁ, añjalikammaṁ, sāmīcikammaṁ, āsanābhihāraṁ sādiyati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.170_0: pakatattassa bhikkhuno seyyābhihāraṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ, pādakathalikaṁ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.171_0: pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁseti, ācāravipattiyā anuddhaṁseti,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.172_0: gihiddhajaṁ dhāreti, titthiyaddhajaṁ dhāreti, titthiye sevati, bhikkhū na sevati,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.173_0: pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekacchanne āvāse vasati, ekacchanne anāvāse vasati,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.173_1: ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vasati,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.173_2: pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ disvā āsanā na vuṭṭhāti,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.173_3: pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ āsādeti anto vā bahi vā—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.176_0: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.180_0: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.183_1: ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.184_0: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.185_0: na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṁ, paccuṭṭhānaṁ, añjalikammaṁ, sāmīcikammaṁ, āsanābhihāraṁ sādiyati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.186_0: na pakatattassa bhikkhuno seyyābhihāraṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ, pādakathalikaṁ, pattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇaṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.188_0: na gihiddhajaṁ dhāreti, na titthiyaddhajaṁ dhāreti, na titthiye sevati, bhikkhū sevati, bhikkhusikkhāya sikkhati …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.189_0: na pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekacchanne āvāse vasati,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.189_2: na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vasati,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.189_4: na pakatattaṁ bhikkhuṁ āsādeti anto vā bahi vā—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.192_0: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.196_1: channena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.197_1: saṅghena āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.197_2: āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.202_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.202_1: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.202_2: āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.203_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.206_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.206_1: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.206_2: āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.208_0: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.213_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghena, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.213_1: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.215_0: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme,
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.217_0: Paṭippassaddhaṁ saṅghena channassa bhikkhuno, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhepanīyakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.218_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena ariṭṭhassa nāma bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.3_0: “tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.4_0: Assosuṁ kho sambahulā bhikkhū ariṭṭhassa nāma kira bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.5_0: “Tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.6_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.9_0: tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:32.1.10_2: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.7_0: Appassādā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.8_0: Aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.17_0: sappasirūpamā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.18_0: Evampi kho ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo tehi bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva taṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharati—
pli-tv-kd11:32.2.19_2: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.1_0: Yato ca kho te bhikkhū nāsakkhiṁsu ariṭṭhaṁ bhikkhuṁ gaddhabādhipubbaṁ etasmā pāpakā diṭṭhigatā vivecetuṁ,
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.1_1: atha kho te bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu,
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā ariṭṭhaṁ bhikkhuṁ gaddhabādhipubbaṁ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.4_0: tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.5_2: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.9_0: Appassādā kāmā vuttā mayā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.10_0: Aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā vuttā mayā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.19_0: sappasirūpamā kāmā vuttā mayā, bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-kd11:32.3.20_1: attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhasi, attānañca khaṇasi, bahuñca apuññaṁ pasavasi.
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.2_0: paṭhamaṁ ariṭṭho bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṁ āropetabbo,
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.2_1: āpattiṁ āropetvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.4_0: Ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.5_0: tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyāti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.11_0: Ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.12_0: tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyāti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.22_0: Ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ—
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.23_0: tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṁ antarāyāyāti.
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.32_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.2_0: Asammukhā kataṁ hoti, appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.6_0: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, asāretvā kataṁ hoti,
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.7_0: asammukhā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.8_0: appaṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.9_0: appaṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.10_0: anāpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.11_0: adesanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.12_0: desitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.13_0: acodetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.14_0: asāretvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.15_0: āpattiṁ anāropetvā kataṁ hoti, adhammena kataṁ hoti, vaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.17_0: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme adhammakammadvādasakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.19_0: Sammukhā kataṁ hoti, paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.23_0: codetvā kataṁ hoti, sāretvā kataṁ hoti,
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.24_0: sammukhā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.25_0: paṭipucchā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.26_0: paṭiññāya kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.27_0: āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.28_0: desanāgāminiyā āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.29_0: adesitāya āpattiyā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.30_0: codetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.31_0: sāretvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.32_0: āpattiṁ āropetvā kataṁ hoti, dhammena kataṁ hoti, samaggena kataṁ hoti—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.34_0: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme dhammakammadvādasakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.36_0: Bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.41_0: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti,
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.44_0: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, dhammassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsati—
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.47_0: Eko bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṅghe adhikaraṇakārako;
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.48_0: eko bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno;
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.50_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho,
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.51_0: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho,
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.53_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho,
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.54_0: Aparesampi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho,
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.56_0: imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho,
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.57_0: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissage ukkhepanīyakamme ākaṅkhamānachakkaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.58.1_0: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.65_2: ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
pli-tv-kd11:33.1.78_0: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme tecattālīsavattaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.1_0: Atha kho saṅgho ariṭṭhassa bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa,
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.4_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.6_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.7_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd11:34.1.12_0: kathañhi nāma so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso saṅghena,
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.5_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.10_0: Pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, savacanīyaṁ karoti, anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.12_0: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme nappaṭippassambhetabbatecattālīsakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.14_0: Na upasampādeti, na nissayaṁ deti, na sāmaṇeraṁ upaṭṭhāpeti,
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.17_2: ukkhepanīyakammaṁ kataṁ hoti taṁ āpattiṁ na āpajjati, aññaṁ vā tādisikaṁ, tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṁ;
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.18_0: kammaṁ na garahati, kammike na garahati—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.22_0: Na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaṁ ṭhapeti, na pavāraṇaṁ ṭhapeti, na savacanīyaṁ karoti, na anuvādaṁ paṭṭhapeti, na okāsaṁ kāreti, na codeti, na sāreti, na bhikkhūhi sampayojeti—
pli-tv-kd11:34.2.24_0: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakamme paṭippassambhetabbatecattālīsakaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.2_2: ukkhepanīyakammakatena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.3_2: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattāmi, lomaṁ pātemi, netthāraṁ vattāmi,
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.8_2: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.12_2: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.19_2: ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati, lomaṁ pāteti, netthāraṁ vattati,
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.19_3: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.24_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.25_0: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ sattamaṁ.
